Name: Asterix and Obelix Meet Cleopatra

Outline: One year after Kevin was left home alone and had to defeat a pair of bumbling burglars, he accidentally finds himself in New York City, and the same criminals are not far behind.

Name: Nanny McPhee
Credit: Dir: Kirk Jones With: Emma Thompson, Colin Firth, Angela Lansbury
Outline: Emma Thompson stars as a governess who uses magic to rein in the behavior of seven ne'er-do-well children in her charge.

Name: Short Circuit
Credit: Dir: John Badham With: Ally Sheedy, Steve Guttenberg, Fisher Stevens
Outline: Number 5 of a group of experimental robots in a lab is electrocuted, suddenly becomes intelligent, and escapes.

Name: Monsters vs. Aliens
Genre: Animation | Action | Adventure | Comedy | Family | Sci-Fi
Credit: Dir: Rob Letterman, Conrad Vernon With: Reese Witherspoon, Rainn Wilson, Stephen Colbert
Outline: A woman transformed into a giant after she is struck by a meteorite on her wedding day becomes part of a team of monsters sent in by the U.S. government to defeat an alien mastermind trying to take over Earth.

Name: Hoodwinked!
Credit: Dir: Cory Edwards, Todd Edwards With: Anne Hathaway, Glenn Close, Patrick Warburton
Outline: Little Red Riding Hood, the Wolf, the Woodsman, and Granny all tell the police the events that lead up to their encounter.

Name: City of Ember
Credit: Dir: Gil Kenan With: Saoirse Ronan, Toby Jones, Bill Murray
Outline: For generations, the people of the City of Ember have flourished in an amazing world of glittering lights. But Ember's once powerful generator is failing ... and the great lamps that illuminate the city are starting to flicker.

Name: Happy Feet
Credit: Dir: George Miller, Warren Coleman With: Elijah Wood, Brittany Murphy, Hugh Jackman
Outline: Into the world of the Emperor Penguins, who find their soul mates through song, a penguin is born who cannot sing. But he can tap dance something fierce!

Name: Annie
Credit: Dir: John Huston With: Aileen Quinn, Albert Finney, Carol Burnett
Outline: A young orphan girl's adventures in finding a family that will take her.

Name: Alice in Wonderland
Credit: Dir: Tim Burton With: Mia Wasikowska, Johnny Depp, Helena Bonham Carter
Outline: Nineteen-year-old Alice returns to the magical world from her childhood adventure, where she reunites with her old friends and learns of her true destiny: to end the Red Queen's reign of terror.

Name: Tomorrowland
Credit: Dir: Brad Bird With: George Clooney, Britt Robertson, Hugh Laurie
Outline: Bound by a shared destiny, a teen bursting with scientific curiosity and a former boy-genius inventor embark on a mission to unearth the secrets of a place somewhere in time and space that exists in their collective memory.

Name: The Water Horse
Credit: Dir: Jay Russell With: Emily Watson, David Morrissey, Alex Etel
Outline: A lonely boy discovers a mysterious egg that hatches a sea creature of Scottish legend.

Name: Turbo
Credit: Dir: David Soren With: Ryan Reynolds, Paul Giamatti, Maya Rudolph
Outline: A freak accident might just help an everyday garden snail achieve his biggest dream: winning the Indy 500.

Name: Cloudy with a Chance of Meatballs 2
Credit: Dir: Cody Cameron, Kris Pearn With: Bill Hader, Anna Faris, Will Forte
Outline: Flint Lockwood now works at The Live Corp Company for his idol Chester V. But he's forced to leave his post when he learns that his most infamous machine is still operational and is churning out menacing food-animal hybrids.

Name: The Lorax
Credit: Dir: Chris Renaud, Kyle Balda With: Zac Efron, Taylor Swift, Danny DeVito
Outline: A 12-year-old boy searches for the one thing that will enable him to win the affection of the girl of his dreams. To find it he must discover the story of the Lorax, the grumpy yet charming creature who fights to protect his world.

Name: Minions
Credit: Dir: Kyle Balda, Pierre Coffin With: Sandra Bullock, Jon Hamm, Michael Keaton
Outline: Minions Stuart, Kevin and Bob are recruited by Scarlet Overkill, a super-villain who, alongside her inventor husband Herb, hatches a plot to take over the world.

Name: Dinosaur
Credit: Dir: Eric Leighton, Ralph Zondag With: D.B. Sweeney, Julianna Margulies, Samuel E. Wright
Outline: An orphaned dinosaur raised by lemurs joins an arduous trek to a sancturary after a meteorite shower destroys his family home.

Name: The Mighty Ducks
Credit: Dir: Stephen Herek With: Emilio Estevez, Joss Ackland, Lane Smith
Outline: A self-centered lawyer is sentenced to community service coaching a rag tag youth hockey team.

Name: The Parent Trap
Credit: Dir: Nancy Meyers With: Lindsay Lohan, Dennis Quaid, Natasha Richardson
Outline: Identical twins, separated at birth and each raised by one of their biological parents, discover each other for the first time at summer camp and make a plan to bring their wayward parents back together.

Name: Night at the Museum
Credit: Dir: Shawn Levy With: Ben Stiller, Carla Gugino, Ricky Gervais
Outline: A newly recruited night security guard at the Museum of Natural History discovers that an ancient curse causes the animals and exhibits on display to come to life and wreak havoc.

Name: The Rocketeer
Credit: Dir: Joe Johnston With: Billy Campbell, Jennifer Connelly, Alan Arkin
Outline: A young pilot stumbles onto a prototype jetpack that allows him to become a high flying masked hero.

Name: Mousehunt
Credit: Dir: Gore Verbinski With: Nathan Lane, Lee Evans, Vicki Lewis
Outline: Two stumblebum inheritors are determined to rid their antique house of a mouse who is equally determined to stay where he is.

Name: Goosebumps
Credit: Dir: Rob Letterman With: Jack Black, Dylan Minnette, Odeya Rush
Outline: A teenager teams up with the daughter of young adult horror author R. L. Stine after the writer's imaginary demons are set free on the town of Madison, Delaware.

Name: Charlotte's Web
Credit: Dir: Gary Winick With: Dakota Fanning, Julia Roberts, Oprah Winfrey
Outline: Wilbur the pig is scared of the end of the season, because he knows that come that time, he will end up on the dinner table. He hatches a plan with Charlotte, a spider that lives in his pen, to ensure that this will never happen.

Name: Rio 2
Credit: Dir: Carlos Saldanha With: Jesse Eisenberg, Anne Hathaway, Jemaine Clement
Outline: It's a jungle out there for Blu, Jewel and their three kids after they're hurtled from Rio de Janeiro to the wilds of the Amazon. As Blu tries to fit in, he goes beak-to-beak with the vengeful Nigel, and meets his father-in-law.

Name: The Santa Clause
Credit: Dir: John Pasquin With: Tim Allen, Judge Reinhold, Wendy Crewson
Outline: When a man inadvertantly kills Santa on Christmas Eve, he finds himself magically recruited to take his place.

Name: Shrek Forever After
Credit: Dir: Mike Mitchell With: Mike Myers, Cameron Diaz, Eddie Murphy
Outline: Rumpelstiltskin tricks a mid-life crisis burdened Shrek into allowing himself to be erased from existence and cast in a dark alternate timeline where Rumpel rules supreme.

Name: Oz the Great and Powerful
Credit: Dir: Sam Raimi With: James Franco, Michelle Williams, Rachel Weisz
Outline: A small-time magician is swept away to an enchanted land and is forced into a power struggle between three witches.

Name: The Three Musketeers
Credit: Dir: Stephen Herek With: Charlie Sheen, Kiefer Sutherland, Chris O'Donnell
Outline: The three best of the disbanded Musketeers - Athos, Porthos, and Aramis - join a young hotheaded would-be-Musketeer...

Name: Robots
Credit: Dir: Chris Wedge, Carlos Saldanha With: Ewan McGregor, Halle Berry, Mel Brooks
Outline: In a robot world, a young idealistic inventor travels to the big city to join his inspiration's company, only to find himself opposing its sinister new management.

Name: The Chronicles of Narnia: The Voyage of the Dawn Treader
Credit: Dir: Michael Apted With: Ben Barnes, Skandar Keynes, Georgie Henley
Outline: Lucy and Edmund Pevensie return to Narnia with their cousin Eustace where they meet up with Prince Caspian for a trip across the sea aboard the royal ship The Dawn Treader. Along the way they encounter dragons, dwarves, merfolk, and a band of lost warriors before reaching the edge of the world.

Name: Bean
Credit: Dir: Mel Smith With: Rowan Atkinson, Peter MacNicol, John Mills
Outline: The bumbling Mr. Bean travels to America when he is given the responsibility of bringing a highly valuable painting to a Los Angeles museum.

Name: TMNT
Genre: Animation | Action | Adventure | Comedy | Family | Fantasy | Sci-Fi
Credit: Dir: Kevin Munroe With: Patrick Stewart, Mako, Chris Evans
Outline: When the world is threatened by an ancient evil, the four adolescent turtles must reunite and overcome their faults in order to stand against it.

Name: Mr. Bean's Holiday
Credit: Dir: Steve Bendelack With: Rowan Atkinson, Willem Dafoe, Steve Pemberton
Outline: Mr. Bean wins a trip to Cannes where he unwittingly separates a young boy from his father and must help the two come back together. On the way he discovers France, bicycling, and true love, among other things.

Name: Cars 2
Credit: Dir: John Lasseter, Brad Lewis With: Owen Wilson, Larry the Cable Guy, Michael Caine
Outline: Star race car Lightning McQueen and his pal Mater head overseas to compete in the World Grand Prix race. But the road to the championship becomes rocky as Mater gets caught up in an intriguing adventure of his own: international espionage.

Name: Ella Enchanted
Credit: Dir: Tommy O'Haver With: Anne Hathaway, Hugh Dancy, Cary Elwes
Outline: Ella is under a spell to be constantly obedient, a fact she must hide from her new step-family in order to protect the prince of the land, her friend for whom she's falling.

Name: Space Jam
Genre: Animation | Adventure | Comedy | Family | Fantasy | Sci-Fi | Sport
Credit: Dir: Joe Pytka With: Michael Jordan, Wayne Knight, Theresa Randle
Outline: Michael Jordan agrees to help the Looney Tunes play a basketball game vs. alien slavers to determine their freedom.

Name: The Little Rascals
Credit: Dir: Penelope Spheeris With: Travis Tedford, Bug Hall, Brittany Ashton Holmes
Outline: Alfalfa is wooing Darla and his "He-Man-Woman-Hating" friends attempt to sabotage the relationship.

Name: Honey, I Shrunk the Kids
Credit: Dir: Joe Johnston With: Rick Moranis, Matt Frewer, Marcia Strassman
Outline: The scientist father of a teenage girl and boy accidentally shrinks his and two other neighborhood teens to the size of insects. Now the teens must fight diminutive dangers as the father searches for them.

Name: Night at the Museum: Secret of the Tomb
Credit: Dir: Shawn Levy With: Ben Stiller, Robin Williams, Owen Wilson
Outline: Larry spans the globe, uniting favorite and new characters while embarking on an epic quest to save the magic before it is gone forever.

Name: Diary of a Wimpy Kid
Credit: Dir: Thor Freudenthal With: Zachary Gordon, Robert Capron, Rachael Harris
Outline: The adventures of a teenager who is fresh out and in Middle School, where he has to learn the consequences and responsibility to survive the year.

Name: Mr. Magorium's Wonder Emporium
Credit: Dir: Zach Helm With: Natalie Portman, Dustin Hoffman, Jason Bateman
Outline: Molly Mahoney is the awkward and insecure manager of Mr. Magorium's Wonder Emporium, the strangest, most fantastic, most wonderful toy store in the world. But when Mr. Magorium, the 243 year-old eccentric who owns the store, bequeaths the store to her, a dark and ominous change begins to take over the once remarkable Emporium.

Name: The Princess Diaries
Credit: Dir: Garry Marshall With: Julie Andrews, Anne Hathaway, Hector Elizondo
Outline: Mia Thermopolis has just found out that she is the heir apparent to the throne of Genovia. With her friends Lilly and Michael Moscovitz in tow, she tries to navigate through the rest of her 16th year.

Name: The Karate Kid
Credit: Dir: Harald Zwart With: Jackie Chan, Jaden Smith, Taraji P. Henson
Outline: Work causes a single mother to move to China with her young son; in his new home, the boy embraces kung fu, taught to him by a master.

Name: Sky High
Credit: Dir: Mike Mitchell With: Kurt Russell, Kelly Preston, Michael Angarano
Outline: Set in an era where superheroes are commonly known and accepted, young William Stronghold, the son of the Commander and Jetstream, tries to find a balance between being a normal teenager and an extraordinary being.

Name: Alexander and the Terrible, Horrible, No Good, Very Bad Day
Credit: Dir: Miguel Arteta With: Steve Carell, Jennifer Garner, Ed Oxenbould
Outline: Alexander's day begins with gum stuck in his hair, followed by more calamities. However, he finds little sympathy from his family and begins to wonder if bad things only happen to him, his mom, dad, brother and sister - who all find themselves living through their own terrible, horrible, no good, very bad day.

Name: The Game Plan
Credit: Dir: Andy Fickman With: Dwayne Johnson, Kyra Sedgwick, Madison Pettis
Outline: An NFL quarterback living the bachelor lifestyle discovers that he has an 8-year-old daughter from a previous relationship.

Name: Open Season
Credit: Dir: Roger Allers, Jill Culton With: Ashton Kutcher, Martin Lawrence, Debra Messing
Outline: Boog, a domesticated 900lb. Grizzly bear, finds himself stranded in the woods 3 days before Open Season. Forced to rely on Elliot, a fast-talking mule deer, the two form an unlikely friendship and must quickly rally other forest animals if they are to form a rag-tag army against the hunters.

Name: Bee Movie
Credit: Dir: Steve Hickner, Simon J. Smith With: Jerry Seinfeld, RenÃ©e Zellweger, Matthew Broderick
Outline: Barry B. Benson, a bee just graduated from college, is disillusioned at his lone career choice: making honey. On a special trip outside the hive, Barry's life is saved by Vanessa, a florist in New York City. As their relationship blossoms, he discovers humans actually eat honey, and subsequently decides to sue them.

Name: The Tale of Despereaux
Credit: Dir: Sam Fell, Robert Stevenhagen With: Matthew Broderick, Emma Watson, Dustin Hoffman
Outline: The tale of three unlikely heroes - a misfit mouse who prefers reading books to eating them, an unhappy rat who schemes to leave the darkness of the dungeon, and a bumbling servant girl with cauliflower ears - whose fates are intertwined with that of the castle's princess.

Name: The Sorcerer's Apprentice
Credit: Dir: Jon Turteltaub With: Nicolas Cage, Jay Baruchel, Alfred Molina
Outline: Master sorcerer Balthazar Blake must find and train Merlin's descendant to defeat dark sorceress Morgana le Fey.

Name: Inkheart
Credit: Dir: Iain Softley With: Brendan Fraser, Andy Serkis, Eliza Bennett
Outline: A young girl discovers her father has an amazing talent to bring characters out of their books and must try to stop a freed villain from destroying them all, with the help of her father, her aunt, and a storybook's hero.

Name: Zathura: A Space Adventure
Genre: Action | Adventure | Comedy | Family | Fantasy | Sci-Fi
Credit: Dir: Jon Favreau With: Josh Hutcherson, Jonah Bobo, Dax Shepard
Outline: Two young brothers are drawn into an intergalactic adventure when their house is hurled through the depths of space by the magical board game they are playing.

Name: Freaky Friday
Credit: Dir: Mark Waters With: Jamie Lee Curtis, Lindsay Lohan, Mark Harmon
Outline: An overworked mother and her daughter do not get along. When they switch bodies, each is forced to adapt to the other's life for one freaky Friday.

Name: The Golden Compass
Credit: Dir: Chris Weitz With: Nicole Kidman, Daniel Craig, Dakota Blue Richards
Outline: In a parallel universe, young Lyra Belacqua journeys to the far North to save her best friend and other kidnapped children from terrible experiments by a mysterious organization.

Name: Planet 51
Credit: Dir: Jorge Blanco, Javier Abad With: Dwayne Johnson, Seann William Scott, Jessica Biel
Outline: An alien civilization is invaded by Astronaut Chuck Baker, who believes that the planet was uninhabited. Wanted by the military, Baker must get back to his ship before it goes into orbit without him.

Name: Small Soldiers
Credit: Dir: Joe Dante With: Kirsten Dunst, Gregory Smith, David Cross
Outline: When missile technology is used to enhance toy action figures, the toys soon begin to take their battle programming too seriously.

Name: Bedtime Stories
Credit: Dir: Adam Shankman With: Adam Sandler, Keri Russell, Courteney Cox
Outline: A hotel handyman's life changes when the lavish bedtime stories he tells his niece and nephew start to magically come true.

Name: Speed Racer
Credit: Dir: Lana Wachowski, Lilly Wachowski With: Emile Hirsch, Matthew Fox, Christina Ricci
Outline: A young driver, Speed Racer, aspires to be champion of the racing world with the help of his family and his high-tech Mach 5 automobile.

Name: The Kid
Credit: Dir: Jon Turteltaub With: Bruce Willis, Spencer Breslin, Emily Mortimer
Outline: An unhappy and disliked image consultant gets a second shot at life when an eight year old version of himself mysteriously appears.

Name: Shrek the Third
Credit: Dir: Chris Miller, Raman Hui With: Mike Myers, Cameron Diaz, Eddie Murphy
Outline: When his new father-in-law, King Harold falls ill, Shrek is looked at as the heir to the land of Far, Far Away. Not one to give up his beloved swamp, Shrek recruits his friends Donkey and Puss in Boots to install the rebellious Artie as the new king. Princess Fiona, however, rallies a band of royal girlfriends to fend off a coup d'etat by the jilted Prince Charming.

Name: The SpongeBob Movie: Sponge Out of Water
Credit: Dir: Paul Tibbitt, Mike Mitchell With: Tom Kenny, Antonio Banderas, Bill Fagerbakke
Outline: When a diabolical pirate above the sea steals the secret Krabby Patty formula, SpongeBob and his nemesis Plankton must team up in order to get it back.

Name: Mr. Popper's Penguins
Credit: Dir: Mark Waters With: Jim Carrey, Carla Gugino, Angela Lansbury
Outline: The life of a businessman begins to change after he inherits six penguins, and as he transforms his apartment into a winter wonderland, his professional side starts to unravel.

Name: Nim's Island
Credit: Dir: Jennifer Flackett, Mark Levin With: Jodie Foster, Gerard Butler, Abigail Breslin
Outline: A young girl inhabits an isolated island with her scientist father and communicates with a reclusive author of the novel she's reading.

Name: Casper
Credit: Dir: Brad Silberling With: Bill Pullman, Christina Ricci, Cathy Moriarty
Outline: A paranormal expert and his daughter bunk in an abandoned house populated by 3 mischievous ghosts and one friendly one.

Name: How the Grinch Stole Christmas
Credit: Dir: Ron Howard With: Jim Carrey, Taylor Momsen, Kelley
Outline: On the outskirts of Whoville, there lives a green, revenge-seeking Grinch who plans on ruining the Christmas holiday for all of the citizens of the town.

Name: Arthur and the Invisibles
Credit: Dir: Luc Besson With: Freddie Highmore, Mia Farrow, Madonna
Outline: Ten-year-old Arthur, in a bid to save his grandfather's house from being demolished, goes looking for some much-fabled hidden treasure in the land of the Minimoys, a tiny people living in harmony with nature.

Name: Shark Tale
Credit: Dir: Bibo Bergeron, Vicky Jenson With: Will Smith, Robert De Niro, RenÃ©e Zellweger
Outline: When a son of a gangster shark boss is accidently killed while on the hunt, his would-be prey and his vegetarian brother both decide to use the incident to their own advantage.

Name: Gnomeo & Juliet
Credit: Dir: Kelly Asbury With: James McAvoy, Emily Blunt, Maggie Smith
Outline: The neighboring gardens of Montague and Capulet are at war, but the gnomes, Gnomeo and Juliet, are in love.

Name: Teenage Mutant Ninja Turtles II: The Secret of the Ooze
Credit: Dir: Michael Pressman With: Paige Turco, David Warner, Michelan Sisti
Outline: The Turtles and the Shredder battle once again, this time for the last cannister of the ooze that created the Turtles, which Shredder wants to create an army of new mutants.

Name: Night at the Museum: Battle of the Smithsonian
Credit: Dir: Shawn Levy With: Ben Stiller, Owen Wilson, Amy Adams
Outline: Security guard Larry Daley infiltrates the Smithsonian Institution in order to rescue Jedediah and Octavius, who have been shipped to the museum by mistake.

Name: Happy Feet 2
Credit: Dir: George Miller, Gary Eck With: Elijah Wood, Robin Williams, Pink
Outline: Mumble's son, Erik, is struggling to realize his talents in the Emperor Penguin world. Meanwhile, Mumble and his family and friends discover a new threat their home -- one that will take everyone working together to save them.

Name: Percy Jackson & the Olympians: The Lightning Thief
Credit: Dir: Chris Columbus With: Logan Lerman, Kevin McKidd, Steve Coogan
Outline: A teenager discovers he's the descendant of a Greek god and sets out on an adventure to settle an on-going battle between the gods.

Name: D2: The Mighty Ducks
Credit: Dir: Sam Weisman With: Emilio Estevez, Kathryn Erbe, Michael Tucker
Outline: Gordon Bombay is forced to withdraw from the minor hockey league with a knee injury. Much to his surprise...

Name: Baby's Day Out
Credit: Dir: Patrick Read Johnson With: Lara Flynn Boyle, Joe Mantegna, Joe Pantoliano
Outline: Baby Bink couldn't ask for more; he has adoring (if somewhat sickly-sweet) parents, he lives in a huge mansion...

Name: Stuart Little
Credit: Dir: Rob Minkoff With: Michael J. Fox, Geena Davis, Hugh Laurie
Outline: The Little family adopt a charming young mouse named Stuart, but the family cat wants rid of him.

Name: Percy Jackson: Sea of Monsters
Credit: Dir: Thor Freudenthal With: Logan Lerman, Alexandra Daddario, Brandon T. Jackson
Outline: In order to restore their dying safe haven, the son of Poseidon and his friends embark on a quest to the Sea of Monsters to find the mythical Golden Fleece while trying to stop an ancient evil from rising.

Name: The Ant Bully
Credit: Dir: John A. Davis With: Paul Giamatti, Nicolas Cage, Julia Roberts
Outline: After Lucas Nickle floods an ant colony with his watergun, he's magically shrunken down to insect size and sentenced to hard labor in the ruins.

Name: The Karate Kid, Part II
Credit: Dir: John G. Avildsen With: Pat Morita, Ralph Macchio, Pat E. Johnson
Outline: Daniel accompanies his mentor to Okinawa who is off to see his dying father and confront his old rival, while Daniel inadvertently makes an enemy of his own.

Name: 3 Men and a Baby
Credit: Dir: Leonard Nimoy With: Tom Selleck, Steve Guttenberg, Ted Danson
Outline: Three bachelors find themselves forced to take care of a baby left by one of the guys' girlfriends.

Name: Pan
Credit: Dir: Joe Wright With: Levi Miller, Hugh Jackman, Garrett Hedlund
Outline: 12-year-old orphan Peter is spirited away to the magical world of Neverland, where he finds both fun and danger, and ultimately discovers his destiny -- to become the hero who will be forever known as Peter Pan.

Name: A Cinderella Story
Credit: Dir: Mark Rosman With: Hilary Duff, Chad Michael Murray, Jennifer Coolidge
Outline: Routinely exploited by her wicked stepmother, the downtrodden Sam Montgomery is excited about the prospect of meeting her Internet beau at the school's Halloween dance.

Name: Asterix and Obelix vs. Caesar
Credit: Dir: Claude Zidi With: Christian Clavier, GÃ©rard Depardieu, Roberto Benigni
Outline: The well-known little village from the Asterix and Obelix-comic books is in trouble: It is the last place not controlled by Rome...

Name: Confessions of a Shopaholic
Credit: Dir: P.J. Hogan With: Isla Fisher, Hugh Dancy, Krysten Ritter
Outline: A college grad lands a job as a financial journalist in New York City to support where she nurtures her shopping addiction and falls for a wealthy entrepreneur.

Name: What a Girl Wants
Credit: Dir: Dennie Gordon With: Amanda Bynes, Colin Firth, Kelly Preston
Outline: An American teenager learns that her father is a wealthy British politician running for office. Although she is eager to find him, she realizes it could cause a scandal and cost him the election.

Name: Free Willy
Credit: Dir: Simon Wincer With: Jason James Richter, Lori Petty, Michael Madsen
Outline: When a boy learns that a beloved killer whale is to be killed by the aquarium owners, the boy risks everything to free the whale.

Name: Pokémon: The First Movie - Mewtwo Strikes Back
Genre: Animation | Action | Adventure | Family | Sci-Fi | Sport
Credit: Dir: Kunihiko Yuyama, Michael Haigney With: Veronica Taylor, Rachael Lillis, Eric Stuart
Outline: Scientists genetically create a new PokÃ©mon, Mewtwo, but the results are horrific and disastrous.

Name: The Last Song
Credit: Dir: Julie Anne Robinson With: Miley Cyrus, Liam Hemsworth, Greg Kinnear
Outline: A rebellious girl is sent to a Southern beach town for the summer to stay with her father. Through their mutual love of music, the estranged duo learn to reconnect.

Name: Cheaper by the Dozen
Credit: Dir: Shawn Levy With: Steve Martin, Bonnie Hunt, Hilary Duff
Outline: With his wife doing a book tour, a father of twelve must handle a new job and his unstable brood.

Name: Chicken Little
Credit: Dir: Mark Dindal With: Zach Braff, Joan Cusack, Garry Marshall
Outline: After ruining his reputation with the town, a courageous chicken must come to the rescue of his fellow citizens when aliens start an invasion.

Name: Look Who's Talking
Credit: Dir: Amy Heckerling With: John Travolta, Kirstie Alley, Olympia Dukakis
Outline: After a single, career-minded woman is left on her own to give birth to the child of a married man, she finds a new romantic chance in a cab driver. Meanwhile the point-of-view of the newborn boy is narrated through voice over.

Name: Journey 2: The Mysterious Island
Genre: Action | Adventure | Comedy | Family | Fantasy | Sci-Fi
Credit: Dir: Brad Peyton With: Josh Hutcherson, Dwayne Johnson, Michael Caine
Outline: Sean Anderson partners with his mom's husband on a mission to find his grandfather, who is thought to be missing on a mythical island.

Name: You Again
Credit: Dir: Andy Fickman With: Kristen Bell, Odette Annable, Sigourney Weaver
Outline: When a young woman realizes her brother is about to marry the girl who bullied her in high school, she sets out to expose the fiancÃ©e's true colors.

Name: Monte Carlo
Credit: Dir: Thomas Bezucha With: Selena Gomez, Leighton Meester, Katie Cassidy
Outline: Three young women vacationing in Paris find themselves whisked away to Monte Carlo after one of the girls is mistaken for a British heiress.

Name: Journey to the Center of the Earth
Credit: Dir: Eric Brevig With: Brendan Fraser, Josh Hutcherson, Anita Briem
Outline: On a quest to find out what happened to his missing brother, a scientist, his nephew and their mountain guide discover a fantastic and dangerous lost world in the center of the earth.

Name: Planes
Credit: Dir: Klay Hall With: Carlos Alazraqui, Dane Cook, Stacy Keach
Outline: A cropdusting plane with a fear of heights lives his dream of competing in a famous around-the-world aerial race.

Name: Race to Witch Mountain
Genre: Action | Adventure | Family | Fantasy | Sci-Fi | Thriller
Credit: Dir: Andy Fickman With: Dwayne Johnson, Carla Gugino, AnnaSophia Robb
Outline: A Las Vegas cabbie enlists the help of a UFO expert to protect two siblings with paranormal powers from the clutches of an organization that wants to use the kids for their nefarious plans.

Name: The Princess Diaries 2: Royal Engagement
Credit: Dir: Garry Marshall With: Anne Hathaway, Callum Blue, Julie Andrews
Outline: Now settled in Genovia, Princess Mia faces a new revelation: she is being primed for an arranged marriage to an English suitor.

Name: Nacho Libre
Credit: Dir: Jared Hess With: Jack Black, Ana de la Reguera, HÃ©ctor JimÃ©nez
Outline: Berated all his life by those around him, a monk follows his dream and dons a mask to moonlight as a Luchador (Mexican wrestler).

Name: 101 Dalmatians
Credit: Dir: Stephen Herek With: Glenn Close, Jeff Daniels, Joely Richardson
Outline: A woman kidnaps puppies to kill them for their fur, but various animals then gang up against her and get their revenge in slapstick fashion.

Name: Fred Claus
Credit: Dir: David Dobkin With: Vince Vaughn, Paul Giamatti, Elizabeth Banks
Outline: Fred Claus, Santa's bitter older brother, is forced to move to the North Pole.

Name: The Pink Panther
Credit: Dir: Shawn Levy With: Steve Martin, Kevin Kline, Jean Reno
Outline: Bumbling Inspector Clouseau must solve the murder of a famous soccer coach and find out who stole the infamous Pink Panther diamond.

Name: Mirror Mirror
Credit: Dir: Tarsem Singh With: Lily Collins, Julia Roberts, Armie Hammer
Outline: An evil queen steals control of a kingdom and an exiled princess enlists the help of seven resourceful rebels to win back her birthright.

Name: Kicking & Screaming
Credit: Dir: Jesse Dylan With: Will Ferrell, Robert Duvall, Josh Hutcherson
Outline: Family man Phil Weston, a lifelong victim of his father's competitive nature, takes on the coaching duties of a kids' soccer team, and soon finds that he's also taking on his father's dysfunctional way of relating...

Name: The Santa Clause 2
Credit: Dir: Michael Lembeck With: Tim Allen, Spencer Breslin, Elizabeth Mitchell
Outline: Scott Calvin has been a humble Santa Claus for nearly ten years, but it might come to an end if he doesn't find a Mrs. Claus.

Name: The Pink Panther 2
Credit: Dir: Harald Zwart With: Steve Martin, Jean Reno, Emily Mortimer
Outline: Insp. Jacques Clouseau teams up with a squad of International detectives who are just as bumbling as he is. Their mission: Stop a globe-trotting thief who specializes in stealing historical artifacts.

Name: The Pacifier
Credit: Dir: Adam Shankman With: Vin Diesel, Brittany Snow, Max Thieriot
Outline: Disgraced Navy SEAL Shane Wolfe is handed a new assignment: Protect the five Plummer kids from enemies of their recently deceased father -- a government scientist whose top-secret experiment remains in the kids' house.

Name: Beethoven
Credit: Dir: Brian Levant With: Charles Grodin, Bonnie Hunt, Dean Jones
Outline: A slobbering St. Bernard becomes the center of attention for a loving family, but its veterinarian secretly wants to kill him.

Name: Daddy Day Care
Credit: Dir: Steve Carr With: Eddie Murphy, Jeff Garlin, Anjelica Huston
Outline: Two men get laid off and have to become stay-at-home dads when they can't find jobs. This inspires them to open their own day-care center.

Name: The Smurfs
Credit: Dir: Raja Gosnell With: Hank Azaria, Katy Perry, Jonathan Winters
Outline: When the evil wizard Gargamel chases the tiny blue Smurfs out of their village, they tumble from their magical world into New York City.

Name: RV
Credit: Dir: Barry Sonnenfeld With: Robin Williams, Cheryl Hines, Kristin Chenoweth
Outline: Bob Munro and his dysfunctional family rent an RV for a road trip to the Colorado Rockies, where they ultimately have to contend with a bizarre community of campers.

Name: Dennis the Menace
Credit: Dir: Nick Castle With: Walter Matthau, Mason Gamble, Joan Plowright
Outline: When his parents have to go out of town, Dennis stays with Mr. and Mrs. Wilson. The little menace is driving Mr. Wilson crazy, but Dennis is just trying to be helpful. Even to the thief who's arrived in town.

Name: Jingle All the Way
Credit: Dir: Brian Levant With: Arnold Schwarzenegger, Sinbad, Phil Hartman
Outline: A father vows to get his son a Turbo Man action figure for Christmas, however, every store is sold out of them, and he must travel all over town and compete with everybody else in order to find one.

Name: Stuart Little 2
Credit: Dir: Rob Minkoff With: Michael J. Fox, Geena Davis, Hugh Laurie
Outline: Stuart and Snowbell set out across town to rescue a friend.

Name: George of the Jungle
Credit: Dir: Sam Weisman With: Brendan Fraser, Leslie Mann, Thomas Haden Church
Outline: George grows up in the jungle raised by apes. Based on the Cartoon series.

Name: The Smurfs 2
Credit: Dir: Raja Gosnell With: Neil Patrick Harris, Jayma Mays, Katy Perry
Outline: The Smurfs team up with their human friends to rescue Smurfette, who has been kidnapped by Gargamel since she knows a secret spell that can turn the evil sorcerer's newest creation - creatures called the Naughties - into real Smurfs.

Name: The Spy Next Door
Credit: Dir: Brian Levant With: Jackie Chan, Amber Valletta, Billy Ray Cyrus
Outline: Former CIA spy Bob Ho takes on his toughest assignment to date: looking after his girlfriend's three kids, who haven't exactly warmed to their mom's beau.

Name: Cheaper by the Dozen 2
Credit: Dir: Adam Shankman With: Steve Martin, Bonnie Hunt, Hilary Duff
Outline: Steve Martin and Bonnie Hunt return as heads of the Baker family who, while on vacation, find themselves in competition with a rival family of eight children, headed by Eugene Levy.

Name: Spy Kids
Credit: Dir: Robert Rodriguez With: Alexa PenaVega, Daryl Sabara, Antonio Banderas
Outline: The children of secret-agent parents must save them from danger.

Name: Evan Almighty
Credit: Dir: Tom Shadyac With: Steve Carell, Morgan Freeman, Lauren Graham
Outline: God contacts Congressman Evan Baxter and tells him to build an ark in preparation for a great flood.

Name: Big Fat Liar
Credit: Dir: Shawn Levy With: Frankie Muniz, Amanda Bynes, Paul Giamatti
Outline: After a young boy's school essay erroneously finds its way into the hands of a Hollywood producer who turns the idea into a hit film, the boy travels to Los Angeles to claim his credit.

Name: Old Dogs
Credit: Dir: Walt Becker With: Robin Williams, John Travolta, Seth Green
Outline: Two friends and business partners find their lives turned upside down when strange circumstances lead to them being placed in the care of 7-year-old twins.

Name: The Lizzie McGuire Movie
Credit: Dir: Jim Fall With: Hilary Duff, Adam Lamberg, Clayton Snyder
Outline: Lizzie McGuire has graduated from middle school and takes a trip to Rome, Italy with her class. And what was supposed to be only a normal trip, becomes a teenager's dream come true.

Name: Doctor Dolittle
Credit: Dir: Betty Thomas With: Eddie Murphy, Peter Boyle, Ossie Davis
Outline: A Doctor finds out that he can understand what animals are saying. And the animals find out that he understands.

Name: Aquamarine
Credit: Dir: Elizabeth Allen Rosenbaum With: Emma Roberts, Joanna 'JoJo' Levesque, Sara Paxton
Outline: Two teenage girls discover a mermaid in their beach club's swimming pool.

Name: Alvin and the Chipmunks
Credit: Dir: Tim Hill With: Jason Lee, David Cross, Cameron Richardson
Outline: A struggling songwriter named Dave Seville finds success when he comes across a trio of singing chipmunks: mischievous leader Alvin, brainy Simon, and chubby, impressionable Theodore.

Name: Ri¢hie Ri¢h
Credit: Dir: Donald Petrie With: Macaulay Culkin, Edward Herrmann, John Larroquette
Outline: A rich young boy finds his family targeted in an inside job and must use his cunning to save them.

Name: Christmas with the Kranks
Credit: Dir: Joe Roth With: Tim Allen, Jamie Lee Curtis, Dan Aykroyd
Outline: With their daughter away, the Kranks decide to skip Christmas altogether until she decides to come home, causing an uproar when they have to celebrate the holiday at the last minute.

Name: Zookeeper
Credit: Dir: Frank Coraci With: Kevin James, Rosario Dawson, Leslie Bibb
Outline: A group of zoo animals decide to break their code of silence in order to help their lovable zoo keeper find love -- without opting to leave his current job for something more illustrious.

Name: Cats & Dogs
Credit: Dir: Lawrence Guterman With: Alec Baldwin, Tobey Maguire, Jeff Goldblum
Outline: A look at the top-secret, high-tech espionage war going on between cats and dogs, which their human owners are blissfully unaware of.

Name: Flubber
Credit: Dir: Les Mayfield With: Robin Williams, Marcia Gay Harden, Christopher McDonald
Outline: An absent-minded professor discovers "flubber," a rubber-like super-bouncy substance.

Name: G-Force
Genre: Action | Adventure | Comedy | Family | Fantasy | Sci-Fi
Credit: Dir: Hoyt Yeatman With: Will Arnett, PenÃ©lope Cruz, Zach Galifianakis
Outline: A specially trained squad of guinea pigs is dispatched to stop a diabolical billionaire from taking over the world.

Name: Eragon
Credit: Dir: Stefen Fangmeier With: Ed Speleers, Sienna Guillory, Jeremy Irons
Outline: In his homeland of Alagaesia, a farm boy happens upon a dragon's egg -- a discovery that leads him on a predestined journey where he realizes he's the one person who can defend his home against an evil king.

Name: Spy Kids 2: Island of Lost Dreams
Credit: Dir: Robert Rodriguez With: Alexa PenaVega, Daryl Sabara, Antonio Banderas
Outline: The Cortez siblings set out for a mysterious island, where they encounter a genetic scientist and a set of rival spy kids.

Name: Lost in Space
Credit: Dir: Stephen Hopkins With: Gary Oldman, William Hurt, Matt LeBlanc
Outline: The Robinson family was going into space to fight for a chance for humanity. Now they are fighting to live long enough to find a way home.

Name: Agent Cody Banks
Genre: Action | Adventure | Comedy | Crime | Family | Romance | Thriller
Credit: Dir: Harald Zwart With: Frankie Muniz, Hilary Duff, Andrew Francis
Outline: A government agent trains Cody Banks in the ways of covert operations that require younger participants.

Name: Tooth Fairy
Credit: Dir: Michael Lembeck With: Dwayne Johnson, Ashley Judd, Julie Andrews
Outline: A bad deed on the part of a tough minor-league hockey player results in an unusual sentence: He must serve one week as a real-life tooth fairy.

Name: Garfield: A Tail of Two Kitties
Credit: Dir: Tim Hill With: Breckin Meyer, Jennifer Love Hewitt, Billy Connolly
Outline: Jon and Garfield visit the United Kingdom, where a case of mistaken cat identity finds Garfield ruling over a castle. His reign is soon jeopardized by the nefarious Lord Dargis, who has designs on the estate.

Name: Toys
Credit: Dir: Barry Levinson With: Robin Williams, Michael Gambon, Joan Cusack
Outline: When a military general inherits a toy making company and begins making war toys, his employees band together to stop him before he ruins the name of Zevo Toys forever.

Name: Garfield
Credit: Dir: Peter Hewitt With: Breckin Meyer, Jennifer Love Hewitt, Stephen Tobolowsky
Outline: Jon Arbuckle buys a second pet, a dog named Odie. However, Odie is then abducted and it is up to Jon's cat, Garfield, to find and rescue the canine.

Name: The Karate Kid, Part III
Credit: Dir: John G. Avildsen With: Ralph Macchio, Pat Morita, Robyn Lively
Outline: Ostracised villain John Kreese attempts to gain revenge on Daniel and Miyagi, with the help of a Vietnam War comrade, the wealthy owner of a toxic waste disposal business.

Name: Scooby-Doo 2: Monsters Unleashed
Genre: Adventure | Comedy | Family | Fantasy | Horror | Mystery
Credit: Dir: Raja Gosnell With: Freddie Prinze Jr., Sarah Michelle Gellar, Matthew Lillard
Outline: Mystery Inc. must save Coolsville from an attack of past unmasked monsters brought to life by an evil masked figure trying to "unmask" the gang.

Name: Meet Dave
Credit: Dir: Brian Robbins With: Eddie Murphy, Elizabeth Banks, Gabrielle Union
Outline: A crew of miniature aliens operate a spaceship that has a human form. While trying to save their planet, the aliens encounter a new problem, as their ship becomes smitten with an Earth woman.

Name: The Haunted Mansion
Credit: Dir: Rob Minkoff With: Eddie Murphy, Marsha Thomason, Jennifer Tilly
Outline: A realtor and his wife and children are summoned to a mansion, which they soon discover is haunted, and while they attempt to escape, he learns an important lesson about the family he has neglected.

Name: Gulliver's Travels
Credit: Dir: Rob Letterman With: Jack Black, Emily Blunt, Jason Segel
Outline: Travel writer Lemuel Gulliver takes an assignment in Bermuda, but ends up on the island of Liliput, where he towers over its tiny citizens.

Name: 102 Dalmatians
Credit: Dir: Kevin Lima With: Glenn Close, GÃ©rard Depardieu, Ioan Gruffudd
Outline: Cruella DeVil gets out of prison and goes after them darned puppies once more.

Name: The Flintstones
Credit: Dir: Brian Levant With: John Goodman, Rick Moranis, Rosie O'Donnell
Outline: In this live-action feature of the cartoon show, Fred Flintstone finally gets the job he's always wanted, but it may just come at a price.

Name: Herbie Fully Loaded
Genre: Adventure | Comedy | Family | Fantasy | Romance | Sport
Credit: Dir: Angela Robinson With: Lindsay Lohan, Michael Keaton, Cheryl Hines
Outline: Maggie Peyton, the new owner of Number 53 - the free-wheelin' Volkswagen bug with a mind of its own - puts the car through its paces on the road to becoming a NASCAR competitor.

Name: Honey I Blew Up the Kid
Credit: Dir: Randal Kleiser With: Rick Moranis, Marcia Strassman, Robert Oliveri
Outline: The Szalinski family is back, this time hilarious disaster strikes when an experiment causes their new toddler son to grow many stories tall.

Name: Dr. Dolittle 2
Credit: Dir: Steve Carr With: Eddie Murphy, Cedric the Entertainer, Kristen Wilson
Outline: Dolittle must save a forest and a bear's life.

Name: Alvin and the Chipmunks: The Squeakquel
Credit: Dir: Betty Thomas With: Jason Lee, Zachary Levi, David Cross
Outline: The world famous singing pre-teen chipmunk trio return to contend with the pressures of school, celebrity, and a rival female music group known as The Chipettes.

Name: High School Musical 3: Senior Year
Genre: Comedy | Drama | Family | Music | Musical | Romance
Credit: Dir: Kenny Ortega With: Zac Efron, Vanessa Hudgens, Ashley Tisdale
Outline: As seniors in high school, Troy and Gabriella struggle with the idea of being separated from one another as college approaches. Along with the rest of the Wildcats, they stage a spring musical to address their experiences, hopes and fears about their future.

Name: Home Alone 3
Credit: Dir: Raja Gosnell With: Alex D. Linz, Olek Krupa, Rya Kihlstedt
Outline: Alex Pruitt, a young boy of nine living in Chicago, fend off thieves who seek a top-secret chip in his toy car to support a North Korean terrorist organization's next deed.

Name: The Last Airbender
Credit: Dir: M. Night Shyamalan With: Noah Ringer, Nicola Peltz, Jackson Rathbone
Outline: Follows the adventures of Aang, a young successor to a long line of Avatars, who must master all four elements and stop the Fire Nation from enslaving the Water Tribes and the Earth Kingdom.

Name: Hannah Montana: The Movie
Credit: Dir: Peter Chelsom With: Miley Cyrus, Emily Osment, Billy Ray Cyrus
Outline: As Hannah Montana's popularity begins to take over her life, Miley Stewart, on the urging from her father takes a trip to her hometown of Crowley Corners, Tennessee to get some perspective on what matters in life the most.

Name: Spy Kids 3-D: Game Over
Credit: Dir: Robert Rodriguez With: Daryl Sabara, Alexa PenaVega, Antonio Banderas
Outline: Carmen's caught in a virtual reality game designed by the Kids' new nemesis, the Toymaker (Stallone). It's up to Juni to save his sister, and ultimately the world.

Name: Inspector Gadget
Credit: Dir: David Kellogg With: Matthew Broderick, Rupert Everett, Joely Fisher
Outline: A security guard's dreams come true when he is selected to be transformed into a cybernetic police officer.

Name: Super Mario Bros.
Credit: Dir: Annabel Jankel, Rocky Morton With: Bob Hoskins, John Leguizamo, Dennis Hopper
Outline: Two Brooklyn plumbers, Mario and Luigi, must travel to another dimension to rescue a princess from the evil dictator King Koopa and stop him from taking over the world.

Name: The Cat in the Hat
Credit: Dir: Bo Welch With: Mike Myers, Spencer Breslin, Dakota Fanning
Outline: Sally and Conrad are two bored kids whose life is turned up-side-down when a talking cat comes to visit them.

Name: Superman IV: The Quest for Peace
Credit: Dir: Sidney J. Furie With: Christopher Reeve, Gene Hackman, Margot Kidder
Outline: The Man of Steel crusades for nuclear disarmament and meets Lex Luthor's latest creation, Nuclear Man.

Name: Spice World
Credit: Dir: Bob Spiers With: Melanie Brown, Emma Bunton, Melanie Chisholm
Outline: World famous pop group The Spice Girls zip around London in their luxurious double decker tour bus having various adventures and performing for their fans.

Name: Son of the Mask
Credit: Dir: Lawrence Guterman With: Jamie Kennedy, Traylor Howard, Alan Cumming
Outline: Tim Avery, an aspiring cartoonist, finds himself in a predicament when his dog stumbles upon the mask of Loki. Then after conceiving an infant son "born of the mask", he discovers just how looney child raising can be.
